Dialogue: gives the thumbs up gesture.

Speaker: galvatron's ships

Speaker: shuttle
Dialogue: Possible song - optimistic adventure with the suggestion that all dreams might not happen.

Dialogue: Yep, I remember the dust was so thick off Beta 4 had to use windshield wipers on your optic sensors....

Dialogue: Me, Grimlock, know all about wipers! Want to hear good part of story!

Dialogue: Good part, Kup! Tell Swoop good part!

Dialogue: SLAG  Good part...tell
CONTINUED:

Dialogue: Okay, Okay. The dust was really thick and then this gigantic Ick Yak...

Dialogue: Like maybe figure out how we're gonna stay alive.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Time out, for Cybertron's sake!

Dialogue: Time out, time out, time out! Suddenly, the shuttle rocks from impact and SPARKS and flames shoot out of large hole in wall

Speaker: ultra magnus
Dialogue: Kup! Raise your force fields at once! They're armed with.....

Dialogue: They're closing on us!

Dialogue: Yep, like the shrikebats of Dromedon!

Dialogue: Yeah, how'd you beat them?

Dialogue: Okay, so you were right.

Dialogue: They're coming back.

Dialogue: Let's just hope we've screwed up their trajectories.

Dialogue: Whew!!!

Dialogue: Yep, I thought we'd had it that time for sure.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Dive!

Dialogue: crushing the area between Hot Rod and Kup.

Dialogue: Kup and Hot Rod just bought it!

Dialogue: as he works controls which eject more Moleculon Missiles.

Dialogue: Gamma waves in this sector of space create marginal navigation probabilities, however.....

Speaker: hot rod

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Kup!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Fires at the Squid, but not stopping him.

Dialogue: Hot Rod's shot plinks off a couple of tentacles, but the squid keeps coming...

Dialogue: Don't worry, I'm not coming after you.

Speaker: hot rod

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Kup!   Say something!

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Fix me!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Sure, Kup....right away! Hot Rod rapidly PULLS KUP'S SCATTERED BODY PARTS TOGETHER.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Well...what do you think? Kup feels his elbow joint, twists his neck side to side and gets creaks and squeaks and moves legs in odd, creaky way as he is trying himself out.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: There's a piece missing.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: No way....  See, this wasn't yours...it's some kind of prehistoric ion cruncher....and this doohickey looks like a funky energon funnel... and this...
CONTINUED:

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: But all things considered, you did an amazing job, lad! Amazing!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Really?

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Yeah, you even got rid of a nasty burr on my rotator! Now, let's find the Dinos and get off this twisted planet!

Speaker: on kup
Dialogue: as he transforms it's evident that a fender is misplaced and a wheel mounted improperly so it wobbles and he rides unevenly with much chugging and oil spewing

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Don't act hostile. I'll use the universal greeting.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Universal Greeting.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Watch.   I'll have them eating out of my hand.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Or our faces.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Bah-weep-Graaaaagnah wheep ni ni bong...

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Bah-weep-Graaaaagnah wheep ni ni bong... The Sharkticons look interested.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: See, the Universal Greeting works every time.  Now, without making any sudden moves, give them an Energon goody. Kup reaches into his belt, presses a button and pulls out an Energon cube. Hot Rod, somewhat suspicious of the whole process does the came.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: This is getting expensive.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Don't worry, they'll reciprocate. They each hand out three Energon goodies to the remaining six Sharkticons... The Sharkticons eat them happily. Then, they back off, eyeing the two Autobots with menace.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: I thought they were supposed to reciprocate.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Customs vary from place to place. Suddenly, the Sharkticons transform to their vicious mode and lunge at them.

Speaker: the quintessons
Dialogue: slender, spindly framed robotic creatures with oversized five sided heads, each side bearing a different mechanistic face with a different expression on each - smiling, angry, grimacing, suspicious and the fifth face is not yet to be seen. As Hot Rod and Kup are led to certain death in the Quintesson dungeons, harsh, dissonant, metallic and terrifying music plays, underscoring the brutal evil they face,

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Every place reminds you of some place else.....

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: A lot of good it's done us so far!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: I can't transform!

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: They're restraining bolts, lad.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: We got to get a new travel agent.... What is this place?

Dialogue: The world of the savage Sharkticons and their cruel masters the Quintessons. They hunt down those who try to escape the wrath of Unicron, and put them on trial.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: But what if they're innocent?

Speaker: kranix
Dialogue: Guilty or innocent, the sentence is always the same - death!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Unicron?!    Who's Unicron?

Dialogue: A planet six times the size of this one that absorbs everything in its path.

Dialogue: So that's the monster's name.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: I wonder if there's any connection between it and Galvatron.

Speaker: lead quintesson
Dialogue: Guilty.....Or innocent. I repeat.

Speaker: kranix
Dialogue: Spare me this mockery of justice.

Speaker: lead quintesson
Dialogue: I repeat, guilty...or innocent.

Speaker: jurors
Dialogue: Guilty!!

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Not the end I'd wish for, lad.

Dialogue: Where are we, Springer?

Dialogue: Brace for impact!

Dialogue: Yep, this dump is a dump......

Dialogue: Grimlock and Slag react as we

Dialogue: Wish you'd figured that out a little sooner.

Dialogue: We can't hold out forever, but we can give them one whopper of a repair bill.

Dialogue: Lowers his teeth to devour a much smaller Sharkticon, the Sharkticon bares his teeth, realizes that he's a second stringer, and scampers away.

Dialogue: suddenly back off and begin transforming  to the dinobots.

Dialogue: I never thought I'd be so happy to see those big bozos.

Dialogue: I think the problems on this planet will be solved very shortly.

Dialogue: Who are you.

Dialogue: Him Wheelie, him friend.

Dialogue: This exo-suit is fantastic!  Want me to do that?

Dialogue: Stays behind, taking a few shots at...

Speaker: ultra magnus
Dialogue: He stands and shoots.

Dialogue: But what if it doesn't work.

Dialogue: Until all are one!

Speaker: ultra magnus
Dialogue: Damn it!   Open it!

Dialogue: Prime, you said the Matrix would light our darkest hour.

Dialogue: Sweeps, quarter him!

Dialogue: goes flying off his motorcycle.,, He transforms into a motorcycle as The motorcycle transforms into a rider and hops on the new motorcycle and then...

Dialogue: as she fires at a Junkion who is trying to swerve her off the road knocking him off the motorcycle... The Junkion looks down at his missing arm, digs around in the junk for a minute, comes up with another, and then transforms to a motorcycle.

Dialogue: Aren't we getting pompous?

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: I now possess that which you most fear. Unicron LAUGHS and the force of it rocks the surface of the planet, knocking Galvatron to his knees.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: You will do my bidding, or... Unicron roars with laughter.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: ...taste my wrath.

Speaker: unicron
Dialogue: You underestimate me Galvatron.

Speaker: unicron
Dialogue: For a time, I considered sparing your measly little planet, but now you shall witness its dismemberment!

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: No!!!

Speaker: shockwave
Dialogue: Decepticons...we're under attack...Scramble - Then his voice is cut off as...

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: GALVATRON Stop feeding him, you fools!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: I don't believe it.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Wow!

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Nope, never seen anything like it.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: I knew there had to be a first time....  Battle stations!

Speaker: unicron's chest
Dialogue: Galvatron, the matrix hanging around his neck. Transforms to Cannon and fires up at... ... A bright panel on Unicron's chest...

Speaker: other junkions
Dialogue: Or your money back!

Speaker: closer
Dialogue: ... tears it in half.

Speaker: junkions
Dialogue: Free bonus surprise!

Speaker: the cruiser
Dialogue: Is suddenly struck by a ray from Unicron's eye, and half of it is knocked off.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Where's Hot Rod?

Speaker: springer
Dialogue: Sees something in the distance.

Speaker: springer
Dialogue: I don't know, but I hope they didn't get him.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: Debugoids!

Speaker: arcee
Dialogue: Quick!   This way.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: The Autobot Matrix!

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: It will do you no good, Autobot.   It cannot be opened.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Not by a Decepticon.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: It is strange that we should find ourselves as allies...

Speaker: on galvatron
Dialogue: Suddenly, his body is violently twisted, and his arms are almost broken off.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Uhhhh...

Speaker: unicron
Dialogue: Destroy him, or feel yourself torn from limb to limb.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Of course, my master!

Speaker: on galvatron
Dialogue: He peers into the gloom.

Speaker: on galvatron
Dialogue: Weapon drawn.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Puny Autobot, you lack even Prime's courage. There is no response.

Speaker: assorted shots
Dialogue: Unicron now stands atop Cybertron, fighting the various ships that swarm around him like bees. ... Rays streak from his one good eye. ...
CONTINUED: ASSORTED SHOTS  His hands smash fighters... ... Fire shoots from his mouth.

Speaker: the dinobots
Dialogue: Now reaching Unicron's butt, start kicking.

Speaker: grimlock
Dialogue: Me Grimlock kick Butt.

Speaker: grimlock
Dialogue: Me, Grimlock, need new strategy.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: He looks o.s. towards the others.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Help...

Speaker: arcee
Dialogue: Daniel!

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: I'm okay.    They don't even see me.

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: They must not programmed to catch flesh creatures.

Speaker: springer
Dialogue: Us, on the other hand...

Speaker: arcee
Dialogue: Daniel... Try to find help! Arcee fires...

Speaker: unicron's stomach
Dialogue: This is the central processing area for Unicron's "food" and "energy." A long conveyer belt drops junk into a clear, bubbling vat, where it is separated into raw material and energy. The energy, which comes out in raw form, goes into a machine and is crunched into energon cubes, while the solid material, is separated into it's component metals and plastics, formed into ingots and sent elsewhere in an assembly line fashion.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: watches this with awe until he sees...

Speaker: on daniel
Dialogue: He dashes to the shores of the glowing lake...

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Cliffjumper! Jazz!

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Bumblebee!     Dad!

Speaker: spike
Dialogue: Shut off the control, Daniel. Daniel looks around.

Speaker: a control
Dialogue: ..     which controls the whole thing.

Speaker: on daniel
Dialogue: He runs up a catwalk towards it....

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: What do I do? It doesn't have any buttons or anything.

Speaker: spike
Dialogue: Shoot it, Son.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: But I don't have a gun.

Speaker: spike
Dialogue: Use your exo-suit.

Speaker: cliffjumper
Dialogue: Hurry!

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Starts frying the command console!

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: I can't stop it!

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: turns around and sees this.

Speaker: daniel
Dialogue: Dad!

Speaker: spike
Dialogue: Son.

Speaker: spike
Dialogue: You did it!

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Come out, Autobot. We all must die sometime.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: stumbles backward.
CONTINUED:

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: No, I will crush you with bare hands. Hot Rod transforms back to car and tries to race away... ... Galvatron jumps after him and catches him... ... Hot Rod, nearly pinned by Galvatron transforms to humanoid mode.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: First Prime, then Ultra Magnus and now you. It is a pity Autobots die so easily or I might have a sense of satisfaction now. Hot Rod desperately gasps and pulls at Galvatron's hands...

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Gasps.

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Die!

Speaker: another angle
Dialogue: On Hot Rod, his hands, nearly dead, spring to life for a moment and grasp the Matrix which hangs from Galvatron's chest.

Speaker: another angle
Dialogue: A miraculous transformation takes place. ... Hot Rod begins to grow at an alarming rate. ... Age shows on his face. ... He is stronger and wiser.

Speaker: optimus prime
Dialogue: Arise, Rodimus Prime.

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: Optimus!

Speaker: galvatron
Dialogue: Nooooooo!

Speaker: hot rod
Dialogue: This is the end of the road, Galvatron. With that, he picks up the Decepticon and throws him through...

Speaker: springer
Dialogue: I'm almost out of energy. Suddenly, he looks up and sees one of the creatures explode above

Speaker: springer
Dialogue: That's what I call the nick of time.

Speaker: jazz
Dialogue: Let's burn rubber!

Speaker: kup
Dialogue: I knew you had potential, lad!

Speaker: rodimus prime
Dialogue: Autobots, transform and roll out. Rodimus Prime transforms into truck mode as the other Autobots also transform. Daniel and Spike jump into him. Then, in a continuous line, he shoots off, the other Autobots racing behind him.

Speaker: rodimus prime
Dialogue: Let this mark the end of the Cybertronian wars as we move forward to a new age of peace and happiness....

Speaker: all
Dialogue: Until all are one!
